qr_copied.error: QR image could not be copied. Please try again.

url_copied.error: Url could not be copied. Please try again.

nav.share_warning_message: The current sharing will be cancelled as you change the sharing scope. Are you share?

joyride.welcome: Thanks for downloading the app, you can take a quick __steps__ steps tour to understand how easy it is to share your files.

steps.1: You can share files and folders by using these inputs or their shortcuts
steps.2: This switch toggles between private and public sharing scope
steps.2_1: Private: will share your files only inside your wifi or local network
steps.2_2: Public: allows you to share within whole internet, making it accesible for anyone
steps.3: This is your history, by right clicking on them you can re-share, open the folder or delete a history entry

toasts.no_connection: Not connected to network, you can not share files

settings.title: Settings
settings.clean_history_confirm: Press the button again to confirm the action
settings.auth_warning: You need to add both username and password for auth to be enabled
